title: Xtraverse: the Spatang/CKForums
content:
Hey Xtraverse, there's a lot of spam posts showing up over at the CKForums on Spatang.com lately. I've been using the admin-esque powers you gave me (for reasons unknown to me) to give them the axe.

As far as I know, nobody even reads those forums anymore, but I wanted to bring it to your attention because it seems there's at least 3 posts a week advertising some sort of scam.

title: Re: Xtraverse: the Spatang/CKForums
content:
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] I used to post a lot there while my site was VERY small.

Will it got quiet so I left that forum [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yawn.gif[/img] ___________________________________________

title: Re: Xtraverse: the Spatang/CKForums
content: I gave you admin powers?  lol I don't remember ever doing that but I can't see any reason why not.  Thanks for this anyways.  I'm out of town now but I'll try and deal with this when I get back.  Getting rid of guest posting would probably do the trick.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: eh
content: They're probably just Moderator powers.  I get the two confused.
